import React, {useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import "./../../../src/assets/css/admin.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import Footer from "./../../layouts/admin/Footer"; import Navbar from "./../../layouts/admin/Navbar"; import Sidebar from "./../../layouts/admin/Sidebar"; function Users() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ axios.get(`/api/users`).then(res => { if(res.status === 200){ setUsers(res.data.users) } else{ setLoading = false; } }); }, []); var tableHTML = ""; if(loading){ tableHTML = ( Loading... ) } else { tableHTML = users.map((user, idx) => { return ( {user.id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.group_role} {user.last_login_at} {user.last_login_ip} {user.is_active === 1 ? 'Hoạt động' : 'Không hoạt động'} ); }) } const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

); } export default Users;
